modName: Metal Pokemon Battle and Boss Music Covers Mod
summary: Now fight dragons and bad guys to the tunes of remixed metal Pokemon battle music...
descriptionHtml:
As the title suggests this a plugin that will replace the battle songs with remixed metal versions of pokemon battle songs. I made so that when you fight normal bad guys (bandits, giants, ect.) it is the wild pokemon battle songs. For fights with Bosses or dragons, it is a array of other Pokemon battle songs. All songs come from first or second Generation games. 

***OTHER MUSIC MODS THAT I HAVE DONE***:
This one is like this one, but it is with Metal Dovakiin Cover songs.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7793
